name: Escape With IQ
description:
Hello there! Looking for a game that will make you use that big brain of yours? Think you have what it takes? Then a hero like you will need a game like this. What are you waiting for? Download it now and try to solve all the levels. If you solve all the levels there is a hidden gift in the end! (Currently demo version which has only 1 level).

Since this is a demo version i would be really grateful if you file any bugs that happen during your play session on the discussion boards! Thank you for your interest in my game! [Note that i will push updates to the game almost everyday since i work on it all the time.]
